description:
Taps into inner life force to restore a significant
amount of HP and remove all negative status effects.
name: Life Force Healing

description:
Infuses the party's weapons with
elemental fire, increasing damage dealt.
name: Flame Infusion

description:
Infuses the party's weapons with
elemental ice, increasing damage dealt.
name: Frost Infusion

description:
Infuses the party's weapons with
elemental lightning, increasing damage dealt.
name: Thunder Infusion

description:
Dramatically decreases the Attack, Defense,
and Agility of all enemies.
name: Weakening Curse

description:
The ultimate wrestling finisher move
that combines devastating power and technique.
name: Ultimate Finisher

description:
Summons a dragon's inferno that devastates
a single enemy with overwhelming heat.
name: Dragon's Inferno

description:
Calls down a rain of
meteoric flames that damage all enemies.
name: Meteor Shower

description:
Encases all enemies in absolute
zero temperature, causing massive ice damage.
name: Absolute Zero

description:
Creates a barrier of ice around an
ally that decreases damage taken and can counterattack.
name: Ice Barrier

description:
Calls down a massive lightning storm
that strikes all enemies multiple times.
name: Thunderstorm

description:
Channels lightning directly into a target's nervous
system, causing damage based on their max HP.
name: Electric Overload

description:
Submerges the battlefield in raging waters that
damage all enemies and slow their movements.
name: Raging Flood

description:
Drains vitality from an enemy through water
magic and transfers it to the caster.
name: Aqua Absorption

description:
Causes a massive earthquake that deals
heavy earth damage to all enemies.
name: Tectonic Shift

description:
Creates razor-sharp stone spikes that
pierce through an enemy's defenses.
name: Stone Spikes

description:
Summons a devastating cyclone that tears
through all enemies with extreme wind damage.
name: Hurricane Force

description:
Creates a shield of swirling wind
that greatly increases evasion for all allies.
name: Windshield

description:
Calls down divine judgment that causes
massive holy damage to all enemies.
name: Divine Judgment

description:
Channels divine energy to restore a
large amount of HP to all allies.
name: Divine Blessing

description:
Channels the power of the void to
cause devastating darkness damage to all enemies.
name: Void Rift

description:
Drains the life force of an
enemy, dealing damage while healing the caster.
name: Soul Drain

description:
Channels unimaginable arcane power to inflict
devastating non-elemental damage on all enemies.
name: Arcane Annihilation

description:
Combines physical and magical energy into
a devastating blast that ignores defense.
name: Fusion Blast

description:
Completely restores an ally to full
health and removes all negative status effects.
name: Full Restoration

description:
Channels healing energy that restores a
moderate amount of HP to all allies.
name: Group Healing

description:
Dramatically increases the Attack, Defense,
and Magic Defense of all allies.
name: Battle Enhancement

description:
Dramatically decreases the Attack, Defense,
and Agility of all enemies.
name: Weakening Curse

description:
Deploys an automated turret that
attacks all enemies with technological precision.
name: Auto-Turret

description:
Overloads nearby electrical circuits to
create a devastating lightning explosion.
name: Circuit Overload

description:
Deploys nano-machines that enhance
an ally's speed and evasion.
name: Nano Enhancement

description:
Focuses energy into a powerful
beam that ignores enemy defenses.
name: Hyper Beam

description:
Generates a powerful energy
wave that damages all enemies.
name: Energy Wave

description:
Uses nanomachines to rapidly
heal wounds and repair damage.
name: Nano-Repair

description:
Deploys a toxic gas
that poisons all enemies.
name: Toxic Deployment

description:
Creates an energy shield
that significantly reduces damage taken.
name: Energy Shield

description:
A specialized sniper shot that deals
massive damage to a single target.
name: Sniper Shot

description:
Fires a rapid burst
of shots at all enemies.
name: Rapid Fire

description:
A precise shot that targets an
enemy's weak point, causing massive critical damage.
name: Weak Point Shot

description:
A specialized shot
that pierces through defenses.
name: Armor-Piercing Shot

description:
Fires an explosive round
that damages multiple enemies.
name: Explosive Round

description:
Loads a tranquilizer round that
puts an enemy to sleep.
name: Tranquilizer Shot

description:
A devastating shot that unleashes all
ammo at once for massive damage.
name: Full Clip Discharge

description:
A chemist's analysis that reveals
enemy weaknesses and lowers their defense.
name: Chemical Analysis

description:
Throws a toxic mixture that poisons
an enemy and lowers their attack.
name: Toxic Mixture

description:
Creates a healing potion that
restores HP to an ally.
name: Healing Potion

description:
Creates an elixir that cures
all status ailments for an ally.
name: Panacea

description:
Creates a mixture that drains HP
from an enemy and heals the user.
name: Drain Solution

description:
Creates a strengthening compound that
boosts an ally's attack power.
name: Strengthening Compound

description:
Creates a defensive compound
that boosts an ally's defense.
name: Defensive Compound

description:
Creates a blinding powder
that blinds an enemy.
name: Blinding Powder

description:
Creates a paralytic agent
that paralyzes an enemy.
name: Paralytic Agent

description:
Throws an unstable compound that creates
a massive explosion affecting all enemies.
name: Explosive Compound

description:
The ultimate healing mixture that restores
half of an ally's maximum HP.
name: Ultimate Potion

description:
A thief's skill that deals damage and
has a chance to steal an item.
name: Snatch Strike

description:
Attempts to steal an item from
the target with increased success rate.
name: Mug

description:
Makes the user harder to detect, increasing
evasion and chance to escape from battle.
name: Stealth

description:
A precise strike targeting
an enemy's weak points.
name: Vital Strike

description:
Performs a series of
rapid strikes on multiple enemies.
name: Rapid Strikes

description:
Throws sand to blind all
enemies and decrease their accuracy.
name: Sand Toss

description:
Opens locked doors and
chests without a key.
name: Lockpicking

description:
A specialized attack that
drains an enemy's HP.
name: Assassin's Strike

description:
A powerful strike with a
high chance of instant death.
name: Killing Blow

description:
Allows the party to detect
traps and hidden items in dungeons.
name: Trap Detection

description:
Dramatically increases chances
of escaping from battle.
name: Swift Escape

description:
The ultimate thief technique that deals massive damage and
has a high chance to steal a rare item.
name: Master Theft

description:
Delivers an inspiring speech that boosts
the morale and Attack of all allies.
name: Inspiring Speech

description:
Uses confusion tactics on all
enemies, making them attack each other.
name: Sow Discord

description:
Creates unity among all allies,
dramatically increasing all their defensive stats.
name: Unity Formation

description:
Charms an enemy with a seductive smile,
causing them to temporarily join your side.
name: Seductive Charm

description:
Provides tactical insights that greatly increase
the critical hit rate for all allies.
name: Critical Insights

description:
Negotiates with an enemy, making them
less likely to attack your weakest ally.
name: Negotiated Truce

description:
Creates a diversion that makes all
enemies target you instead of allies.
name: Taunt Diversion

description:
Boosts an ally's morale, healing
their HP and increasing their Attack.
name: Morale Boost

description:
Passionately rallies all allies, massively increasing
all their stats for one decisive turn.
name: Heroic Rally

description:
Delivers a devastating speech that massively decreases
all stats of all enemies for one turn.
name: Crushing Demoralization

description:
Shares tactical knowledge that increases
the Accuracy of all allies.
name: Tactical Advice

description:
Boosts team coordination, increasing
the Agility of all allies.
name: Team Coordination

description:
Shares defensive strategies that increase
the Defense of all allies.
name: Defensive Tactics

description:
Focuses inner potential, dramatically increasing
all personal stats for 3 turns.
name: Self-Actualization

description:
Delivers a motivational speech that
increases all stats for all allies.
name: Motivational Speech

description:
Uses intimidation to decrease
an enemy's Attack and Defense.
name: Intimidation

description:
Uses mental disruption techniques to decrease
all enemies' Magic Attack and Magic Defense.
name: Mental Disruption

description:
Taunts enemies to decrease
their Accuracy and Evasion.
name: Provocative Taunt

description:
Uses psychological techniques to decrease
all stats of an enemy.
name: Psychological Warfare

description:
Unexpectedly compliments an enemy, increasing
their Attack but lowering their Defense.
name: Confusing Compliment

description:
Boosts an enemy's confidence but makes them
reckless, increasing their Attack while decreasing their Evasion.
name: Overconfidence

description:
Shares tactical advice with an enemy,
increasing their Defense but slowing their Agility.
name: Defensive Overcaution

description:
Uses reverse psychology to make an enemy focus too
much on accuracy, increasing their Accuracy but lowering their Attack.
name: Careful Aiming

description:
Genuinely encourages an enemy,
boosting all their stats slightly.
name: Genuine Encouragement

description:
Forms a temporary alliance with an
enemy, increasing their Defense and Magic Defense.
name: Temporary Alliance

description:
Shares tactical knowledge with all enemies,
increasing their Defense but decreasing their Agility.
name: Mixed Tactics

description:
Sings a calming song that increases all
enemies' Magic Defense but puts them to sleep.
name: Deceptive Lullaby

description:
Dramatically increases the Attack and Magic Attack of
an ally but decreases their Defense and Magic Defense.
name: Berserk Encouragement

description:
Dramatically increases an ally's Accuracy
and Evasion but decreases their Attack.
name: Precision Focus

description:
A powerful bite attack
that deals physical damage.
name: Predator's Bite

description:
Sharp claws tear into
the enemy, causing bleeding damage.
name: Razor Claws

description:
Rapid kicks that hit
an enemy multiple times.
name: Hind Kick

description:
A crushing attack using
massive horns or antlers.
name: Gore Attack

description:
Charges at full speed
to deliver a powerful impact.
name: Charging Tackle

description:
Temporarily blinds enemies by kicking up
dirt or creating a cloud of ink.
name: Blinding Screen

description:
Sprays or secretes a
toxic substance that poisons enemies.
name: Toxic Venom

description:
Emits a disorienting
sound that confuses enemies.
name: Sonic Disorientation

description:
Paralyzes prey with a
stinger or electric shock.
name: Paralyzing Sting

description:
Drains blood or life energy
from a target to restore health.
name: Life Drain

description:
Entangles the opponent in webbing,
vines, or tentacles, restricting movement.
name: Entangle

description:
Rapidly flaps wings to create powerful
gusts of wind that damage enemies.
name: Wing Gust

description:
Mesmerizes the target with a hypnotic
pattern or sound, putting them to sleep.
name: Hypnotic Mesmerize

description:
Strikes with a venomous
barb, causing damage and poison.
name: Venomous Strike

description:
Unleashes a powerful electric shock
that may paralyze the target.
name: Electric Shock

description:
Breathes a stream of
fire that burns enemies.
name: Fire Breath

description:
Breathes a freezing blast
that damages and slows enemies.
name: Frost Breath

description:
Delivers a crushing blow
with a powerful tail.
name: Tail Smash

description:
Attacks with multiple tentacles,
hitting the target several times.
name: Tentacle Barrage

description:
Shoots a powerful jet
of water at high pressure.
name: Pressurized Water Jet

description:
Causes the ground to
shake, damaging all enemies.
name: Earthquake Stomp

description:
Suddenly pounces on prey
with incredible speed and power.
name: Ambush Pounce

description:
A devastating roar that
damages and intimidates all enemies.
name: Terrifying Roar

description:
Emits a high-frequency screech
that damages and disables enemies.
name: Sonic Screech

description:
Secretes a healing substance
that cures status ailments.
name: Healing Secretion

description:
Changes color or form to
blend with surroundings, increasing evasion.
name: Camouflage

description:
A furious frenzy of
attacks when cornered or threatened.
name: Berserk Frenzy

description:
Calls nearby allies of the
same species to join the fight.
name: Pack Call

description:
The ultimate predator attack that deals
massive damage to a single target.
name: Apex Predator Strike

description:
A vicious attack that targets
the throat of an enemy.
name: Throat Bite

description:
Summons shadowy tendrils from another dimension
that grasp and damage the target.
name: Void Tendrils

description:
Manifests a fragment of a
star that explodes with cosmic light.
name: Starfall Fragment

description:
Creates a prismatic field that
distorts reality, causing unpredictable damage.
name: Reality Distortion

description:
Opens a small rift that devours
a quarter of the target's life force.
name: Devouring Rift

description:
Inverts the target's senses,
causing confusion and stat reversal.
name: Sensory Inversion

description:
Creates a perfect geometric pattern
that shatters reality around the target.
name: Fractal Geometry

description:
Reverses the flow of time around a
wound, healing it as if it never existed.
name: Temporal Reversion

description:
Summons countless eyes from the void
that gaze upon enemies, causing psychic damage.
name: Thousand-Eyed Gaze

description:
Forces the target to witness an
unknowable truth, potentially driving them mad.
name: Incomprehensible Revelation

description:
Splits the caster into multiple
quantum versions that exist simultaneously.
name: Quantum Duplication

description:
Creates discordant music that makes
reality itself unstable around enemies.
name: Reality-Warping Melody

description:
Channels pain into power, dealing damage
based on the caster's missing health.
name: Pain Transmutation

description:
Swaps positions and some aspects
of identity between caster and target.
name: Identity Transference

description:
Creates a field where probability itself
is manipulated in the caster's favor.
name: Probability Manipulation

description:
Summons a liquid that flows
against gravity and dissolves reality.
name: Non-Euclidean Fluid

description:
Speaks in a language that reality
itself cannot comprehend, causing glitches in existence.
name: Unutterable Phonemes

description:
Drains concepts and ideas from the
target's mind, manifesting as MP drain.
name: Concept Drain

description:
Temporarily transforms the target
into a bizarre, non-functional form.
name: Metamorphic Absurdity

description:
Creates a whirling vortex of impossible
colors that damage the mind and body.
name: Colors Out Of Space

description:
Plunges the target into a dream within a
dream, causing deep sleep and confusion upon waking.
name: Recursive Dreamscape

description:
Causes the target to experience their
own death in all possible timelines simultaneously.
name: Multiversal Mortality

description:
Creates a paradoxical loop in
time that confuses and traps enemies.
name: Temporal Paradox

description:
Reverses the target's perceptions so they
see allies as enemies and vice versa.
name: Perceptual Inversion

description:
Summons an impossible entity from outside
reality that annihilates everything it touches.
name: Summoning The Outsider

description:
Causes the target to experience
being everywhere and nowhere simultaneously.
name: Spatial Dissonance

description:
Creates a cascading failure in the fabric
of reality, causing damage based on all stats.
name: Reality Cascade Failure

description:
Creates a tiny flame
that barely singes the target.
name: Tiny Flame

description:
Forms a single snowflake that
melts on contact with the target.
name: Snowflake

description:
Creates a small static shock
that barely affects the target.
name: Static Zap

description:
Conjures a few drops of
water that splash the target.
name: Water Droplet

description:
Throws a tiny
pebble at the target.
name: Pebble Toss

description:
Creates a small breeze that
barely moves the target's hair.
name: Gentle Breeze

description:
Creates a tiny sparkle of
light that's more pretty than damaging.
name: Light Sparkle

description:
Creates a small shadow that
briefly passes over the target.
name: Shadow Wisp

description:
Heals a minuscule amount
of HP, barely noticeable.
name: Paper Cut Heal

description:
Has a very small chance to
cure poison, but usually does nothing.
name: Questionable Antidote

description:
Slightly increases the target's Attack,
but the effect is barely noticeable.
name: Minimal Encouragement

description:
Slightly increases the target's Defense,
but the effect is barely noticeable.
name: Whispered Advice

description:
Attempts to decrease an enemy's
Attack, but the effect is minimal.
name: Weak Insult

description:
Drains a tiny amount
of HP from the target.
name: Life Speck Drain

description:
Drains a minimal amount
of MP from the target.
name: Mana Drop Siphon

description:
Creates a very minor magical
effect that deals minimal damage.
name: Magical Puff

description:
Attempts to imbue a weapon with
fire, but only makes it slightly warm.
name: Weapon Warming

description:
Creates a light fog that
has no tactical advantage whatsoever.
name: Useless Fog

description:
Makes the target see slightly
altered colors for a few seconds.
name: Minor Color Shift

description:
Creates a slightly pleasant melody
that has no combat effect.
name: Simple Tune

description:
A swift, precise stab targeting vital
areas with a blade or pointed weapon.
name: Precision Thrust

description:
A powerful horizontal sweep
that can hit multiple enemies.
name: Wide Swing

description:
A powerful downward strike
with full force behind it.
name: Overhead Smash

description:
Performs a flurry of quick
strikes that hit multiple times.
name: Strike Flurry

description:
A powerful upward strike
that can break through defenses.
name: Uppercut Strike

description:
A precise strike targeting a
weak point in the enemy's defenses.
name: Weak Point Strike

description:
A spinning attack that
hits all enemies around you.
name: Whirlwind Slash

description:
A brutal attack that can
cause bleeding damage over time.
name: Laceration Strike

description:
A crushing blow that slams
the enemy to the ground.
name: Ground Slam

description:
A sudden, lightning-fast strike
that's difficult to evade.
name: Swift Strike

description:
A series of rapid
thrusts with a pointed weapon.
name: Rapid Thrust

description:
A heavy blow with the pommel or
hilt of a weapon, potentially stunning the target.
name: Pommel Strike

description:
A slash that targets the
legs to slow enemy movement.
name: Leg Sweep

description:
A crushing blow with the flat
side of a weapon, potentially causing stunning.
name: Flat Strike

description:
A powerful blow using the guard
or hilt to strike at close range.
name: Guard Strike

description:
A powerful diagonal slash
that's difficult to block.
name: Diagonal Slash

description:
A series of cuts that form
an X pattern on the target.
name: Cross Slash

description:
A series of quick, circular
slashes that can hit multiple enemies.
name: Circular Slash

description:
A calculated strike at the
exact moment the enemy is vulnerable.
name: Opportunity Strike

description:
A devastating lunge that puts
all power into a single strike.
name: Power Lunge

description:
The ultimate melee technique combining
multiple movements into one devastating attack.
name: Master's Technique
